title: President Donald J. Trump Is Supporting America’s Students and Families By Encouraging the Safe Reopening of America’s Schools – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Education	

Issued on:
August 12, 2020
We believe many school districts can now reopen safely, provided they implement mitigation measures and health protocols to protect families, protect teachers, and to protect students.
						President Donald J. Trump					SUPPORTING SAFE REOPENINGS: President Donald J. Trump is advocating for schools to safely reopen this fall to ensure our Nation’s children receive optimal education and care.
